footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Baizhu | Update Date: 01/29/2025 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Jadefall's Splendor__
His best in slot option. However he cant utilize well the DMG% buff in its passive, his personal damage is negligable

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Prototype Amber__
Best 4 star option as a craftable HP% 4* catalyst.

__Favonius Codex__
Provides Energy Recharge with team wide Energy generation, but it requires a decent amount of Crit Rate

__Starcaller's Watch__
Depends on if Furina is in the team. If she is present, the weapon has less value. Although it has an Elemental Mastery stat, he does not trigger bloom often, and scales off HP.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> HP% or Energy Recharge|<goblet> HP%|<circlet> Healing Bonus% or HP%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Holistic Revivification
**2)** Elemental Skill: Universal Diagnosis
**N/A)** Normal Attack: The Classics of Acupuncture

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
If you already have a character that has __Deepwood Memories__ in your team, playing an Aggravate or non-Dendro team, (e.g. Neuvillette teams), than there is no need to go for it on Baizhu. 

The __Ocean-Hued Clam__ set can be used instead of the __Songs of Days Past__ if you are not farming for Navia for the sake of resin efficiency. 

If building for Favonius Codex, CRIT Rate should also 
be built from substats or a circlet.

If you are not playing him as an on-field driver, leveling up his Normal Attacks are unnecessary.
